比尔克林顿和阿尔戈尔
是新一代的民主党

translation.en: They don't think the way the old Democratic party did.
translation.zh: 他们的想法和老一代的民主党不一样

translation.en: They've sent a strong signal to criminals by supporting the death penalty.
translation.zh:
他们支持死刑
向罪犯们释放了很强的信号

translation.en: Looking at the way in which Democrats were defeated in 1988,
translation.zh: 看看1988年民主党被打败的方法

translation.en: or they were defeated in 1984, or they were defeated in 1980,
translation.zh:
或是在1984年被打败
在1980年被打败

translation.en: there comes to be a sentiment among the Democrats
translation.zh: 在民主党内部有一种情绪

translation.en: that they have to adopt a position that is much more, uh, kind of, centrist.
translation.zh: 即他们必须采取一种更加中立的姿态

translation.en: It became virtually impossible
translation.zh: 这使得政客对犯罪行为态度温和

translation.en: for a politician to run and appear soft on crime.
translation.zh: 成为不可能

translation.en: I was not for the bill that he was talking about
translation.zh: 我不支持他说的法案

translation.en: because it was not tough enough on the criminal.
translation.zh: 对待犯罪行为不够严厉

translation.en: [Stevenson] In an environment where everybody's doing the same thing, everybody's competing to be tough on crime,
translation.zh:
在这个人人要求
严打犯罪行为的环境里

translation.en: you quickly all end up in the same space,
translation.zh: 你很快也会采取这个立场

translation.en: so it doesn't become a political advantage unless you do something more.
translation.zh:
如果你不继续做些什么
就没有政治优势可言

translation.en: We need more police on the street.
translation.zh: 街头需要有更多警察

translation.en: There is a crime bill which would put more police on the street,
translation.zh: 一个提议街头布置更多警察的提案

translation.en: which was killed for this session by a filibuster in the Senate,
translation.zh: 在参议院被否决

translation.en: mostly by Republican senators.
translation.zh: 尤其是被共和党的参议员

translation.en: We'd consistently had, "Squishy, soft liberal won't protect you.
translation.zh:
一直都是
“温和的自由党不再保护你

translation.en: Tough, conservative will protect you." And we won that fight every time.
translation.zh:
强硬的保守派会保护你”
这场战争每次我们都赢

translation.en: And by the late '80s, early '90s, people like Bill Clinton
translation.zh:
到了八十年代晚期 九十年代早期
比尔克林顿这样的人

translation.en: had begun to figure out they had to be able to match us.
translation.zh: 开始发现他们必须和我们相称

translation.en: I will faithfully execute the Office of President of the United States.
translation.zh: 我会履行美利坚合众国总统的职务

translation.en: Bill Clinton is trying to figure out
translation.zh: 比尔克林顿试图弄清楚

translation.en: how he can deal with a country that's still basically Reagan's country,
translation.zh: 他该如何处理这个仍属于里根的国家

translation.en: but he's trying to govern as a Democrat.
translation.zh: 但他试图作为民主党人来执政

translation.en: Violent crime and the fear it provokes are crippling our society.
translation.zh:
暴力犯罪及对其的恐惧
正在削弱我们的社会

translation.en: Then some high-profile, very horrendous crimes take place.
translation.zh: 然后一些备受瞩目的可怕犯罪出现了

translation.en: Residents pull together in the search for 12-year-old Polly Klaas.
translation.zh: 居民齐心寻找12岁波利克拉斯

translation.en: They are now coping with the discovery of her body over the weekend.
translation.zh: 现在已经发现了她的尸体

translation.en: [Mauer] Polly Klaas, abducted from her bedroom at home and ultimately killed,
translation.zh:
波利克拉斯 被从家中卧室内诱拐
最终被杀害

translation.en: which led to the California "three strikes and you're out" law.
translation.zh:
这个案子引出了加州的
“三击”服刑制

translation.en: When you commit a third violent crime,
translation.zh: 当犯下第三次暴力罪行时

translation.en: you will be put away and put away for good.
translation.zh: 就会被判处终生监禁

translation.en: Three strikes and you are out.
translation.zh: 三振出局

translation.en: A person's convicted of their third felony,
translation.zh: 一个人三次被定重罪

translation.en: essentially that person is mandated to prison for the rest of their lives.
translation.zh: 就意味着他将在监狱中度过余生

translation.en: [reporter] So many third-strike defendants awaiting trial,
translation.zh:
太多三次被起诉的被告
在等待审判

translation.en: the Los Angeles Sheriff's Department
translation.zh: 洛杉矶警察总部

translation.en: is forced to release 4,200 misdemeanor inmates every month
translation.zh: 被迫每个月释放4200名轻罪犯人

translation.en: to make room for incoming three-strike prisoners.
translation.zh: 好为即将到来的三击囚犯腾出房间

translation.en: It's in line with many other policies we've created,
translation.zh: 这符合我们制定的其他政策

translation.en: particularly mandatory minimums.
translation.zh: 特别是强制最少刑期

translation.en: "Mandatory sentencing." We said we were no longer going to let judges
translation.zh:
“强制性刑期”
我们说我们不会再让法官

translation.en: consider the circumstances around a crime.
translation.zh: 考虑犯罪的环境

translation.en: We're just going to impose a mandatory sentence.
translation.zh: 就是要处以一个强制性的判决

translation.en: And that's a difficult thing for judges
translation.zh: 这对法官来说很困难

translation.en: because they are trying to dispense justice on a daily basis
translation.zh: （维拉司法研究所尼克） 他们试图每日主持正义

translation.en: and are unable to do so.
translation.zh: 但却无法做到

translation.en: [reporter] In many California communities, all civil trials have been canceled
translation.zh:
在加州许多社区里
为了完成刑事审判的工作

translation.en: to catch up with the criminal case workload.
translation.zh: 所有的民事审判都被取消

translation.en: [Glenn E. Martin] We've taken discretion away from judges,
translation.zh: 我们剥夺了法官的裁定权

translation.en: arguably the most neutral party in the court,
translation.zh: 他们是法庭上最中立的角色

translation.en: and given it over to prosecutors.
translation.zh: 把裁定权给了检察官

translation.en: Ninety-five percent of elected prosecutors throughout the United States are white.
translation.zh: 在美国95%被选出的检察官… （地方检察官 肯汤普森） …是白人

translation.en: Serious, violent criminals serve at least 85% of their sentence.
translation.zh:
严肃地说 他们审判的
85%的案子都是暴力犯罪

translation.en: [Stevenson] We passed Truth in Sentencing that kept people imprisoned
translation.zh: 我们通过了事实量刑法 让他们85%的刑期在监狱里

translation.en: for 85% of their sentence.
translation.zh: 让他们85%的刑期在监狱里

translation.en: [Martin] Truth in Sentencing. You're sentenced to an amount of time.
translation.zh: 事实量刑法 你被判决服刑一段时期

translation.en: The public wants to be confident
translation.zh: 公众希望确保

translation.en: that you're gonna do just about every bit of that time.
translation.zh: 你会服满刑期

translation.en: We've done away with parole.
translation.zh: 我们不再进行假释 （美国保守派联盟 大卫基恩）

translation.en: So, in the federal system, when you get 20 years or 30 years, that's what you got.
translation.zh:
（美国保守派联盟 大卫基恩） 在联邦制度下 如果你被判刑
二十或三十年 那就要服刑

translation.en: We had parole in this country as a mechanism for getting people out of jails and prisons
translation.zh:
假释机制是针对那些不再给公众
带来威胁的人

translation.en: when it was clear that they were no longer a threat to public safety.
translation.zh: 让他们可以离开监狱

translation.en: Sharanda has spent the last 16 years in prison, and she'll die there,
translation.zh:
萨兰达过去的16年都是在监狱
中度过的 她余生都会在那里

translation.en: because she was sentenced to life without parole.
translation.zh: 因为她被判处终身监禁 不得假释

translation.en: Her only crime? Transporting cocaine.
translation.zh:
她唯一的罪名是什么？
运送可卡因

translation.en: And when I say "only crime," I mean only crime.
translation.zh:
我说“唯一罪名”
我就是这个意思

translation.en: She had no other arrests. None.
translation.zh: 她没有其他的罪名 一个都没有

translation.en: The judge was required... required to send Sharanda away for life.
translation.zh: 法官被要求判处萨兰达终生监禁

translation.en: [Clinton] Longer sentences, three strikes and you're out,
translation.zh: 更长的刑期 三振出局

translation.en: almost 60 new capital punishment offenses...
translation.zh: 大约六十条新的死刑罪行…

translation.en: [Mauer] And then comes the Congress
translation.zh: 然后国会在1994年提出

translation.en: with a proposal for a $30 billion federal crime bill of 1994
translation.zh: 一项三百亿美元的联邦犯罪议案

translation.en: that was heavily loaded towards law enforcement incarceration.
translation.zh:
这对监禁法律的实行
来说是沉重的负担

translation.en: I propose a 21st century crime bill
translation.zh: 我提议21世纪的监狱

translation.en: to deploy the latest technologies and tactics
translation.zh: 应该配备最先进的科技和政策

translation.en: to make our communities even safer.
translation.zh: 让我们的社区更加安全

translation.en: That omnibus crime bill was responsible
translation.zh: 多项关于犯罪的议案

translation.en: for a massive expansion of the prison system.
translation.zh: 引起了监狱体系的大规模扩张

translation.en: And beyond that, it provided all kinds of money and perverse incentives
translation.zh:
不仅如此 还带来了
各种渠道的金钱和反常动力

translation.en: for law enforcement to do a lot of the things
translation.zh: 让执法机关可以做许多事

translation.en: that we nowadays consider to be abusive.
translation.zh: 这些事在我们现在看来就是滥用资源

translation.en: It will be used to build prisons to keep 100,000 violent criminals off the street.
translation.zh:
它们将被用在建造监狱
以保证十万名暴力罪犯不再逍遥法外

translation.en: [Stevenson] Not only does he increase funding to states to build prisons
translation.zh:
他不仅提高了给各州
建造监狱的资金

translation.en: to lock up as many people involved in drug crimes,
translation.zh: 以便关押更多的卷入毒品犯罪的囚犯

translation.en: but also to put 100,000 police officers on the street.
translation.zh: 还在街头布置了十万名警察

translation.en: Crime has been a hot political issue used too often to divide us.
translation.zh:
犯罪被当作政治问题
过多地被使用在分裂我们上面

translation.en: What President Clinton did in 1994
translation.zh: 克林顿总统在1994年所做的…

translation.en: is actually far more harmful than his predecessors
translation.zh: （曾入狱的活动家 克雷格德罗奇） …比他的历次前任危害都要大

translation.en: because he actually built that infrastructure that we see today,
translation.zh:
因为他建立了
我们今天看到的这个框架

translation.en: the militarization all the way down to small, rural police departments
translation.zh:
是彻底的军事化
连小小的乡村警局里

translation.en: that have SWAT teams.
translation.zh: 都有特警小队

translation.en: [Cobb] And again we see this kind of notching up
translation.zh: 我们又一次看到

translation.en: of the number of people who were being arrested at every level
translation.zh: 因各种罪行被逮捕的人越来越多

translation.en: and this kind of exploding prison population.
translation.zh: 监狱人口迅速增长

translation.en: [Cory Booker] We are a nation that professes freedom,
translation.zh: 我们是一个自称自由的国度

translation.en: yet we have this mass incarceration, this hyperincarceration,
translation.zh: 却有如此高的监禁比例…

translation.en: uh, that is trawling into it, grinding into it,
translation.zh: （美国参议员 克里布克） 这种高监禁率被强加给

translation.en: our most vulnerable citizenry,
translation.zh: 我们最脆弱的公民

translation.en: and is overwhelmingly biased towards people of color.
translation.zh: 并对有色人种带有强烈的偏见

translation.en: [Clinton] But I want to say a few words about it.
translation.zh: 但就此我有话要说

translation.en: Because I signed a bill that made the problem worse.
translation.zh:
因为我签署了一个议案
让情况变得更糟

translation.en: And I want to admit it.
translation.zh: 我想要承认

translation.en: His 1994 crime bill, something that he now admits was a mistake...
translation.zh:
他1994年的犯罪议案
他现在在某种程度上承认是个错误…

translation.en: There were longer sentences.
translation.zh: 有更长的刑期

translation.en: And most of these people are in prison under state law,
translation.zh:
这些人大多数因触犯州法律
现在被关押在监狱里

translation.en: but the federal law set a trend.
translation.zh: 但联邦法律设置了一个导向

translation.en: And that was overdone. We were wrong about that.
translation.zh:
这样做太过分了
这一点上我们错了

translation.en: Well, I think it's important that President Clinton, um, acknowledges
translation.zh: 我想重要的是 克林顿总统知道

translation.en: that things didn't turn out exactly as he and all of us would've wished.
translation.zh:
事情并没有像他
以及我们所有人预想的那样发展

translation.en: I'm happy that he realizes the error of his ways.
translation.zh:
我很高兴他用自己的方式
意识到了错误

translation.en: I think he knew back then that it wasn't good policy, I'll be honest.
translation.zh:
我想他事后明白
这不是一个好政策

translation.en: Back then, there was an outcry over the rising crime rate.
translation.zh:
在当时 对这种高犯罪率
有很强烈的抗议 （民主党总统辩论）

translation.en: And people from all communities were asking that action be taken.
translation.zh: 所有社区的人都要求采取行动

translation.en: Now, my husband said at the NAACP last summer
translation.zh:
我丈夫去年夏天
在全国有色人种协会上说过

translation.en: that it solved some problems, but it created other problems,
translation.zh:
这解决了一些问题
但又带来了其他的一些问题

translation.en: and I agree.
translation.zh: 我同意这个看法

translation.en: I'm glad to see that he is apologetic,
translation.zh: 我很高兴看到他的歉意

translation.en: but I think he has to take responsibility and accountability for that,
translation.zh: 但我想他必须为此承担责任

translation.en: and so does Hillary, because she supported it, then and up until recently.
translation.zh:
希拉里也一样
因为她直到最近都支持这个决定

translation.en: [reporter] Bill Clinton faced off against a group of Black Lives Matter protestors
translation.zh:
比尔克林顿针对一群
“黑人的生命也重要”的抗议者

translation.en: protesting a 1994 crime bill
translation.zh: 他们抗议1994年的犯罪提案

translation.en: that they say led to a surge in the imprisonment of black people.
translation.zh:
他们说这个提案引起了
黑人入狱的浪潮

translation.en: I don't know how you would characterize
translation.zh: 我不知道你们会如何评价

translation.en: the gang leaders who got 13-year-old kids hopped up on crack
translation.zh:
那些帮派头目 他们让13岁的孩子
吸食霹雳可卡因

translation.en: and sent 'em out onto the street to murder other African American children.
translation.zh:
并且还让他们到街上去
谋杀其他的非裔美国人的孩子

translation.en: Maybe you thought they were good citizens. She didn't.
translation.zh:
或许你们认为他们是好公民
但她不这么认为

translation.en: -She didn't! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 她不这么认为！

translation.en: You are defending the people who kill the lives you say matter.
translation.zh:
你们在保护那些
杀害你们认为宝贵的生命的人

translation.en: Tell the truth.
translation.zh: 说实话吧

translation.en: We can't ignore the reality of force here.
translation.zh: 我们不能忽视现实的力量

translation.en: The policies that Bill Clinton put forward,
translation.zh: 比尔克林顿推行的政策

translation.en: you know, mandatory minimums, three strikes...
translation.zh: 强制最少刑期 三击…

translation.en: Those were a use of political force.
translation.zh: 这些都是对政治力量的利用

translation.en: They forced millions of people,
translation.zh: 他们迫使几百万的人进了监狱

translation.en: who would not otherwise be in prison today, into prison.
translation.zh: 如果在现在 他们都不会入狱

translation.en: They forced families to be broken.
translation.zh: 他们迫使家庭破碎

translation.en: They forced children to live without their parents.
translation.zh: 迫使孩子失去父母独自生活

translation.en: That's what happened.
translation.zh: 这就是所发生的事

translation.en: [Jones] Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: We shouldn't ask, "Why is Bill Clinton so strong?"
translation.zh:
我们不该问
“比尔克林顿为何如此强势？”

translation.en: We should ask, "Why is the black community so weak
translation.zh:
我们该问的是
“黑人社区为何如此软弱

translation.en: in our inability to defend ourselves?"
translation.zh: 不能保护自己？”

translation.en: Let's not forget how many martyrs we put in the ground in the '60s and '70s.
translation.zh:
不要忘记在六十和七十年代
我们埋葬了多少牺牲者

translation.en: Let's not forget how many of our leaders had to leave the country or are in prison.
translation.zh:
不要忘记有多少我们的领袖
被迫离开国家或是入狱

translation.en: You stripped out a whole generation of leadership.
translation.zh: 你剥夺了一代人的领导权

translation.en: You ran them out the country, you put them in prison,
translation.zh:
将他们逐出这个国家
将他们投进监狱

translation.en: you put them in... in cemeteries.
translation.zh: 将他们送入墓地

translation.en: And then you unleash this blitzkrieg,
translation.zh: 然后你突然发动袭击

translation.en: and we don't have the ability to defend ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们毫无保护自己的能力

translation.en: You can tell the story of white leadership in America
translation.zh: 你可以讲述美国白人领导力的故事

translation.en: and never mention the FBI one time.
translation.zh: 对联邦调查局只字不提

translation.en: You can't tell the story of black leadership, not one,
translation.zh: 但如果你不提刑事审判制度

translation.en: without having to deal with the full weight
translation.zh: 是如何被黑人所反对

translation.en: of the criminal justice system weaponizing its black dissent.
translation.zh: 你就无法讲述黑人领导力的故事

translation.en: I'm tired of living every day under the threat of death.
translation.zh:
我厌倦了每天生活在
死亡的威胁之下

translation.en: I have no martyr complex.
translation.zh: 我没有殉道者情结

translation.en: I want to live as long as anybody in this building tonight.
translation.zh:
我想和今晚在这幢大楼里的
所有人一样活得长久

translation.en: [Jones] Dr. King, people forget, was not this beloved figure
translation.zh:
人们忘记了 金博士
不是那种每个人

translation.en: that everybody wants to put on a pedestal.
translation.zh: 都想放在台座上的可爱的形象

translation.en: Uh, he was considered one of the most dangerous people in America
translation.zh: 联邦调查局的首脑

translation.en: by the head of the Federal Bureau of Investigations.
translation.zh: 曾认为他是美国最危险的人物之一

translation.en: Don't tell me that Dr. King has no relevance to young brothers in the street.
translation.zh:
不要说金博士与街面上的
年轻兄弟们毫无关联

translation.en: They dealing with little cops. He was dealing with the top cop.
translation.zh:
他们面对的是小警察
他面对的警察的首领

translation.en: [Malcolm X] We were brought here against our will.
translation.zh: 我们被强制带到这里

translation.en: We were not brought here to be made citizens.
translation.zh: 我们被带到这里不是为了成为公民

translation.en: We were not brought here to enjoy the, uh, constitutional gifts
translation.zh:
我们被带到这里
不是为了享受那些

translation.en: that they speak so beautifully about.
translation.zh: 他们说的天花乱坠的宪法权利

translation.en: [Jones] Malcolm's whole entourage was infiltrated with police.
translation.zh:
马尔科姆身边的所有人
都被警察渗透了

translation.en: He may have had as many police
translation.zh: 或许他身边的秘密警察

translation.en: as he had regular folk in his entourage, under cover.
translation.zh: 或许他身边的秘密警察 和他的随从一样多

translation.en: So afraid of black dissent.
translation.zh: 如此害怕黑人的反对

translation.en: FBI Director J. Edgar Hoover today asserted that the Black Panthers
translation.zh:
联邦调查局的主管埃德加胡佛
宣称黑豹党

translation.en: represent the greatest internal threat to the nation.
translation.zh: 是这个国家的最大的内部威胁

translation.en: [Gates] J. Edgar Hoover said these Panthers represent the greatest threat
translation.zh:
埃德加胡佛说黑豹党
是当时美国民主制度

translation.en: to American democracy at the time.
translation.zh: 最大的威胁

translation.en: The Panthers never were that big.
translation.zh: 黑豹党从来没有如此被重视

translation.en: I mean, no one in their right mind could ever believe
translation.zh:
我是说 每个头脑正常的人
都不会相信

translation.en: that the Black Panthers were gonna bring down
translation.zh: 黑豹党会打败世界史上

translation.en: the greatest military force in the history of the world.
translation.zh: 最伟大的军事力量

translation.en: The whole movement was criminalized
translation.zh: 整个运动被定义为非法

translation.en: and destroyed systematically by the government.
translation.zh: 被政府彻底摧毁

translation.en: People haven't thought about what it means to lose a Fred Hampton,
